item.mymodtest.moon_glow_katana.effect_d: Night sky attacks may mark enemies
item.mymodtest.oblivion_edge.effect_caus: Causality Reversal: When low HP, equalize enemy HP
item.mymodtest.nmap_katana.module_discov: Host Discovery: Threat scan → Resistance V
item.mymodtest.nmap_katana.module_vuln: Vuln Scan: Guaranteed crit vs unarmored
item.mymodtest.sentinel_helmet.lore: When the dark moves, the watch bell answers.
item.mymodtest.sentinel_helmet.effect: [Echo Pulse] In darkness, detect nearby hostiles and gain Speed I for 1.5s with an alert chime. Range: 16 blocks. Cooldown: 40s
item.mymodtest.silent_oath_helmet.lore: The first strike is forgiven—after that, you pay in full.
item.mymodtest.silent_oath_helmet.effect: [Silent Oath] First hit from hostile mobs reduced by 2 damage. Cooldown: 30s
item.mymodtest.exile_mask_helmet.effect: [Desperation] Below 50% HP: +1 attack per 7.5% HP lost (max +4). Updates every 1s
item.mymodtest.relic_circlet_helmet.lore: Attention is a curse—this ring turns it into shelter.
item.mymodtest.relic_circlet_helmet.effe: [Guardian Aura] Gain Absorption I for 3s when first targeted by a mob. Cooldown: 30s
[Second Chance] Survive lethal explosion damage once, set to 1 HP with Resistance V for 2s. Totem takes priority. Cooldown: 15min
item.mymodtest.old_market_chestplate.lor: Old coins still ring true—if you know where to spend them.
item.mymodtest.old_market_chestplate.eff: [Market Wisdom] Trade XP: 50% chance ×1.5 (first trade per slot, CD 60s). Kill XP: 25% chance ×2 (CD 30s)
item.mymodtest.blood_pact_chestplate.lor: Signed in blood—paid on the next strike.
item.mymodtest.blood_pact_chestplate.eff: [Blood Pact] 50% on hit: self-damage min(50% dmg, 2♥) stored (max 4♥). Next attack consumes pool as bonus damage. 10s window
item.mymodtest.ghost_god_chestplate.lore: Undead curses stop at the edge of this steel.
item.mymodtest.ghost_god_chestplate.effe: [Ghost Ward] Undead damage: 30% (Boss 15%) chance -15%. Undead debuffs (Wither/Hunger/Slowness): 50% (Boss 25%) immune
item.mymodtest.windbreaker_chestplate.ef: [Windbreaker] +30% knockback resistance. When HP drops from ≥50% to <50%: Speed I 5s (CD 90s, rearm at 60%)
Every five seconds, the void takes its bite.
[Void Bite] On attack: +4% true damage (Boss 2%). CD: 5s
